titleInfo.title: Paradoxical Brownian motion in a microfluidic device: Absolute negative mobility

mods.abstract: We report on a paradoxical migration mechanism in a microstructured lab-on-a-chip environment. The phenomenon is based on a subtle interplay between Brownian motion (thermal noise), a periodic and symmetric microstructure, and a biased AC electric field. The resulting non-linear dynamics far from thermal equilibrium gives rise to absolute negative mobility, i.e. a migrational transport, which is - both for negative and positive bias - always opposite to the net acting force, in good agreement between experiment and theory.
